TriggerOraclev10g.name: PASSWORD_ID_TRIG
TriggerOraclev10g.ownerDesignName: Banking App II the SQL ERD
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
IF INSERTING THEN
SELECT password_id_seq.nextVal INTO :new.password_id FROM DUAL;
ELSIF UPDATING THEN
SELECT :old.password_id INTO :new.password_id FROM DUAL;
END IF;
END;
